articles.title: Descendant: Netflix documentary talks to the descendants of the last slave ship to traffic Africans to the US, the Clotilda - ABC News
articles.description: Descendant, on Netflix, reveals the story of the Clotilda: the last to transport African slaves to America, in 1860, and in contravention of the law. It was sunk to hide the evidence.
